text: David Griffith may refer to: *D. W. Griffith (1875–1948), film director *David Griffith (Clwydfardd) (1800–1894), Welsh poet and Archdruid *David Griffith (artist), artist whose work has appeared in role-playing games *David Griffith (bobsleigh), British Olympic bobsledder *David Griffith (comics), a character appearing in Marvel Comics
title: David Griffith
